org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.cache.persistence.snapshot

Class IgniteCacheSnapshotManager<T extends SnapshotOperation>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.cache.GridCacheSharedManagerAdapter
      • org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.cache.persistence.snapshot.IgniteCacheSnapshotManager<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GridCacheSharedManager, IgniteChangeGlobalStateSupport

    public class IgniteCacheSnapshotManager<T extends SnapshotOperation>
extends GridCacheSharedManagerAdapter
implements IgniteChangeGlobalStateSupport
    Snapshot manager stub.

public IgniteInternalFuture tryStartLocalSnapshotOperation(@Nullable

                                                                     AffinityTopologyVersion topVer)
                                                              throws IgniteCheckedException
        Try to start local snapshot operation if it's required by discovery event.
        Parameters:
        discoveryEvent - Discovery event.
        topVer - topology version on the moment when this method was called
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - if failed

      • onMarkCheckPointBegin

        public IgniteFuture<?> onMarkCheckPointBegin(T snapshotOperation,
                                             PartitionAllocationMap map)
                                      throws IgniteCheckedException
        Parameters:
        snapshotOperation - current snapshot operation.
        map - (cacheId, partId) -> (lastAllocatedIndex, count)
        Returns:
        true if next operation must be snapshot, false if checkpoint must be executed.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException

                        ByteBuffer tmpWriteBuf,
                        int writtenPages,

        Parameters:
        fullId - Full page id.
        tmpWriteBuf - buffer
        writtenPages - Overall pages written, negative value means there is no progress tracked
